content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mine at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill (position x=43.0, y=-82.0) and a Furnace (position x=41.0, y=-82.0)

### Iron plate production at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Furnace (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) 

### Iron ore collection at position(x=-15.5, y=-50.5)
No structures found

### Storage at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of three Wooden Chests (positions x=43.5, y=-79.5; x=44.5, y=-81.5; x=45.5, y=-80.5) and a Burner Inserter (position x=43.5, y=-80.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing items on the ground
- Ensure there is enough space on the ground to place items before attempting to do so
### Errors when using burner mining drill
- Ensure there is a sink entity in place to accept the output before starting the drill
### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure there are ingredients to smelt before starting the furnace
### Errors when using burner inserter
- Ensure there are source items to pick up before starting the inserter
